document.discussion_title: UPDATE: 'Dangerous' man with convictions for assault found by police
document.topic_text: Have you got a local story, picture or video you would like to send to us? Send it to us now for a chance to get published. Services UPDATE: 'Dangerous' man with convictions for assault found by police James Gorman A 'DANGEROUS' Darwen man who was wanted by police on recall to prison has been found. Officers said James Gorman had been found in the town over the weekend. The 34-year-old, who lives in Perry Street, has previous convictions for assault and police had put out a witness appeal on Friday asking for information about his whereabouts. They described him as a 'dangerous' man who should not be approached. Officers did not say why he was wanted on recall to prison. Promoted stories
